key_risk_themes: ["Security Vulnerabilities in Authentication Logic","Infrastructure and Deployment Complexity","Critical Dependencies on External Services (Redis, SES)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Re-evaluate effort estimates for all 'High' complexity security features to create a realistic timeline.","Establish a mandatory security code review process for all authentication-related code.","Implement automated Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) security scanning in the CI/CD pipeline."]
